Name: Careless Runes
Effect: Spells cost 4 essence, not 3. Disadvantage on skill checks made to use the Recover and Essence Tap actions.

Name: Reckless Runes
Effect: Whenever you cast a spell, provoke an attack of opportunity. Must maintain concentration to complete the cast.

Name: Slow-setting Runes
Effect: Spells effects are delayed until start of next turn. Must select alterations in advance. Scan reveals which spell and alterations you're casting. Can not use as attack of opportunity.
